entities.name: regulus
entities.description: Regulus might have put the clock, robes, and locket there to protect the locket's hiding place.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry felt as though a brick had slid down through his chest into his stomach when he remembered handling the locket.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron looked at Hermione with a dumbstruck look and asked if something was wrong.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione was standing with one foot in midair, with the dumbstruck look of one who had just been Obliviated.

entities.name: locket
entities.description: The locket was mentioned as being hidden and protected by Regulus.

entities.name: clock
entities.description: The clock shot bolts at everyone, possibly put there by Regulus to protect the locket's hiding place.

entities.name: robes
entities.description: Old robes tried to strangle Ron, possibly put there by Regulus to protect the locket's hiding place.

relationships.description: Regulus might have put the clock, robes, and locket there to protect the locket's hiding place.
Harry had even handled the thing as they passed it around, each trying in turn to pry it open.
